title: Saving America from Marxism | Guest: Melissa Rolfe | 6/22/20
description:
The unrest isn’t about race. It’s about Marxism. Glenn looks at USSR defector Tomas David Schuman’s warning that a four-step KGB method of demoralization, destabilization, crisis, and normalization has been used to flip America for decades. Statues across America are being torn down, but oddly not the Marxist ones. Is America coming to an end, or a new beginning? Melissa Rolfe, stepmother of the former Atlanta officer who shot Rayshard Brooks, Garrett Rolfe, joins after being fired supposedly over her connection to him. The author of the 1619 Project said it would be an “honor” to name the riots after her work. Quarterback Brett Favre argued Colin Kaepernick should be given “hero status” akin to war hero Pat Tillman.
